data.title: Pakistan conveys concerns to Kabul envoy over India-Afghanistan joint statement
data.text:
Synopsis

Pakistan has lodged a protest with Afghanistan's Ambassador over the India-Afghanistan joint statement's reference to Jammu and Kashmir. Islamabad also rejected Afghan Foreign Minister Muttaqi's remarks on terrorism, asserting that Afghan soil is used against Pakistan. The statement also urged unauthorized Afghan nationals in Pakistan to return.
data.summary:
SynopsisPakistan has lodged a protest with Afghanistan's Ambassador over the India-Afghanistan joint statement's reference to Jammu and Kashmir.
Islamabad also rejected Afghan Foreign Minister Muttaqi's remarks on terrorism, asserting that Afghan soil is used against Pakistan.
The statement also urged unauthorized Afghan nationals in Pakistan to return.
